name: Lemony Baked Pita Wedges
description: Make your own version of pita chips at home, in 10 minutes! Healthier than store-bought, these wedges are delicious dunked in your favourite dip. Sprinkle with Lemon Dilly Dip Mix and serve with Dillicous Tzatziki for a tasty side for a Greek-inspired themed meal.

ingredients.name: Lemon Chicken Orzo Seasoning or Lemon Garlic Chicken Seasoning

preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Place Cooling Racks on a Sheet Pan.
In a Prep Bowl, whisk seasoning with oil. Using a Basting Brush, brush each pita with seasoning mixture. Slice pitas into quarters and arrange on cooling racks.
Bake 7 min, or until slightly browned and crispy.
tips: Use Prep Pro Scissors to cut pitas.
Swap in 2 tbsp Lemon Dilly Dip Mix.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein, 2 cups chopped veggies and 2 tbsp Epicure Dip.
